entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0001.57] The concept IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestments with a value of 50,098,000 is dimensionally qualified with the ScheduleOfEquityMethodInvestmentEquityMethodInvesteeNameAxis and the base taxonomy member EquityMethodInvestmentNonconsolidatedInvesteeOrGroupOfInvesteesMember. Only extension members should be used with the axis ScheduleOfEquityMethodInvestmentEquityMethodInvesteeNameAxis.
